sect1.xreflabel: Using the OpenNSD C API: Modules

sect2.title: Introduction: Modules
sect2.para: OpenNSD is a multi-threaded, high performance platform for developing web enabled applications. Although it has a very complete API in both C and Tcl, only the Tcl API is usually used for application development. Both API's can be extended by the use of modules. There is a general lack of information on the use of the C API, and this is the main purpose of this document.
